Generated Narrative: ConceptMap R5-Endpoint-element-map-to-R4

Mapping from http://hl7.org/fhir/5.0 to http://hl7.org/fhir/4.0


Group 1 Mapping from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Endpoint|5.0.0 to Endpointversion: 4.0.1)

Source CodeRelationshipTarget CodeComment
Endpoint.meta (meta)is equivalent toElement `Endpoint.meta` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Endpoint.meta`, but has no comparisons.
Endpoint.implicitRules (implicitRules)is equivalent toElement `Endpoint.implicitRules` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Endpoint.implicitRules`, but has no comparisons.
Endpoint.language (language)is equivalent toElement `Endpoint.language` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Endpoint.language`, but has no comparisons.
Endpoint.text (text)is equivalent toElement `Endpoint.text` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Endpoint.text`, but has no comparisons.
Endpoint.contained (contained)is equivalent toElement `Endpoint.contained` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Endpoint.contained`, but has no comparisons.
Endpoint.identifier (identifier)is equivalent toElement `Endpoint.identifier` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Endpoint.identifier`, but has no comparisons.
Endpoint.status (status)is equivalent toElement `Endpoint.status` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Endpoint.status`, but has no comparisons.
Endpoint.connectionType (connectionType)maps to wider conceptElement `Endpoint.connectionType` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Endpoint.connectionType`, but has no comparisons.
Endpoint.name (name)is equivalent toElement `Endpoint.name` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Endpoint.name`, but has no comparisons.
Endpoint.managingOrganization (managingOrganization)is equivalent toElement `Endpoint.managingOrganization` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Endpoint.managingOrganization`, but has no comparisons.
Endpoint.contact (contact)is equivalent toElement `Endpoint.contact` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Endpoint.contact`, but has no comparisons.
Endpoint.period (period)is equivalent toElement `Endpoint.period` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Endpoint.period`, but has no comparisons.
Endpoint.payload (payload)is related toElement `Endpoint.payload` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Endpoint`, but has no comparisons.
Endpoint.payload.mimeType (mimeType)is equivalent toElement `Endpoint.payload.mimeType` is part of an existing definition because parent element `Endpoint.payload` requires a cross-version extension. Element `Endpoint.payload.mimeType` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Endpoint.payloadMimeType`, but has no comparisons.
Endpoint.address (address)is equivalent toElement `Endpoint.address` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Endpoint.address`, but has no comparisons.
Endpoint.header (header)is equivalent toElement `Endpoint.header` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Endpoint.header`, but has no comparisons.

Group 2 Mapping from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Endpoint|5.0.0 to Extensions for Using Data Elements from FHIR R5 in FHIR R4

Source CodeRelationshipTarget CodeComment
Endpoint.connectionType (connectionType)is equivalent tohttp://hl7.org/fhir/5.0/StructureDefinition/extension-Endpoint.connectionTypeElement `Endpoint.connectionType` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Endpoint.connectionType`, but has no comparisons.
Endpoint.description (description)maps to wider concepthttp://hl7.org/fhir/5.0/StructureDefinition/extension-Endpoint.descriptionElement `Endpoint.description` has a context of Endpoint based on following the parent source element upwards and mapping to `Endpoint`.
Endpoint.environmentType (environmentType)maps to wider concepthttp://hl7.org/fhir/5.0/StructureDefinition/extension-Endpoint.environmentTypeElement `Endpoint.environmentType` has a context of Endpoint based on following the parent source element upwards and mapping to `Endpoint`.
Endpoint.payload (payload)maps to wider concepthttp://hl7.org/fhir/5.0/StructureDefinition/extension-Endpoint.payloadElement `Endpoint.payload` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Endpoint`, but has no comparisons.
Endpoint.payload.type (type)is equivalent tohttp://hl7.org/fhir/5.0/StructureDefinition/extension-Endpoint.payload.typeElement `Endpoint.payload.type` is part of an existing definition because parent element `Endpoint.payload` requires a cross-version extension. Element `Endpoint.payload.type` has a context of Endpoint based on following the parent source element upwards and mapping to `Endpoint`.
Endpoint.payload.mimeType (mimeType)maps to wider concepthttp://hl7.org/fhir/5.0/StructureDefinition/extension-Endpoint.payload.mimeTypeElement `Endpoint.payload.mimeType` is part of an existing definition because parent element `Endpoint.payload` requires a cross-version extension. Element `Endpoint.payload.mimeType` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Endpoint.payloadMimeType`, but has no comparisons.

name: R5EndpointElementMapToR4
title: Cross-version mapping for FHIR R5 Endpoint to FHIR R4 Endpoint
description: This ConceptMap represents cross-version mappings for elements from a FHIR R5 Endpoint to FHIR R4.

target.comment: Element `Endpoint.meta` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Endpoint.meta`, but has no comparisons.
Element `Endpoint.implicitRules` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Endpoint.implicitRules`, but has no comparisons.

Element `Endpoint.payload` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Endpoint`, but has no comparisons.

Element `Endpoint.payload.type` is part of an existing definition because parent element `Endpoint.payload` requires a cross-version extension.
Element `Endpoint.payload.type` has a context of Endpoint based on following the parent source element upwards and mapping to `Endpoint`.

Element `Endpoint.payload.mimeType` is part of an existing definition because parent element `Endpoint.payload` requires a cross-version extension.
Element `Endpoint.payload.mimeType` has is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Endpoint.payloadMimeType`, but has no comparisons.
